original_text: Elam's soldiers came with bows and arrows. They came with chariots and riders on horses. Kir's soldiers prepared their shields to fight.
korean_text: 엘람 사람은 화살통을 메었고 병거 탄 자와 마병이 함께 하였고 기르 사람은 방패를 드러냈으니

sentences.original_text: Elam's soldiers came with bows and arrows
sentences.korean_translation: 엘람의 군사들은 활과 화살을 들고 왔다

sentences.original_text: They came with chariots and riders on horses
Kir's soldiers prepared their shields to fight
sentences.korean_translation: 기르의 군사들은 전투를 위해 방패를 준비했다
